<JD_START>
Job Title: Financial Analyst

Location: Oklahoma City, OK

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Oklahoma City, OK - Candidates must reside in Oklahoma.

Our client is seeking a talented and detail-oriented Financial Analyst to join their team. As a Financial Analyst, you will play a key role in providing accurate financial analysis, forecasting, and strategic insights to support informed decision-making. The successful candidate will possess strong analytical skills, be proficient in financial modeling and reporting, and have a deep understanding of financial concepts and principles.

Responsibilities of Financial Analyst:

Conduct comprehensive financial analysis, including but not limited to budgeting, forecasting, and variance analysis. Generate insightful reports and presentations to communicate financial trends, performance, and forecasts to management. Develop and maintain financial models to support strategic planning and decision-making processes. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather financial data, analyze financial performance, and identify areas for improvement. Assist in the preparation of financial statements, including income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements. Evaluate financial data and metrics to identify risks and opportunities and provide recommendations to mitigate risks and optimize financial performance. Conduct research and analysis on industry trends, competitors, and market conditions to support business strategy development. Assist in the development and monitoring of key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure and track financial performance. Participate in the budgeting process, providing guidance and support to department heads and managers. Stay updated on financial regulations, accounting standards, and best practices to ensure compliance and accuracy in financial analysis and reporting. 

Qualifications of Financial Analyst:

Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. Proven experience as a Financial Analyst or similar role, with a solid understanding of financial analysis and reporting. Strong proficiency in financial modeling, forecasting, and data analysis using tools such as Microsoft Excel. Knowledge of financial principles, accounting practices, and financial regulations. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex financial data into actionable insights. Strong attention to detail and accuracy, with the ability to work effectively under tight deadlines. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively communicate financial concepts to both financial and non-financial stakeholders. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and build positive working relationships. Experience with financial software and ERP systems is desirable. 

Salary Range of Financial Analyst: The salary for this position ranges from $65,000 to $90,000 dependent on the candidate's experience and education. To apply, please visit www.fuse3solutions.com.

#accfin

#ind123

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
